values: 射击；发射；射中；射伤；射杀；投掷；给…注射；（shoot的过去式和过去分词）
射击；开枪；开炮；优秀（或不高明等的）射手；枪手；炮手；发射；注射；击球；枪声；炮声；尝试；弹丸；一席话；一击；铅沙弹；少量饮料；（电影中的）镜头；照片
破损的；损坏的；破烂不堪；无法再使用的；醉酒的；精疲力尽的；用尽的；耗尽的

synonym.mean: 用尽的；破旧的；杂色的，闪光的

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 射击，射中；拍摄；发芽；使爆炸；给…注射

word_group.brief_definition: 大人物；要人；有影响的人
鼓舞的力量, 令人振奋的事情, 强心针
立刻, 飞快地, 毫不犹豫
成功率极低的尝试；轻率的冒险；碰运气的事；瞎猜；根本
短球；短吊；近网低球；网前球
弹孔；爆破孔；炮眼；穿孔；蛀洞
手枪射出的子弹；手枪射程；手枪神枪手
步枪射击；步枪射程；步枪射手

bilingual.source: She heard a shot in the distance.
bilingual.target: 她听到远处传来一声射击。

bilingual.source: He shot at the target with a revolver.
bilingual.target: 他用左轮手枪射击靶子。

bilingual.source: The police officer fired a warning shot.
bilingual.target: 警察开了一枪警告射击。

bilingual.source: The hunter lined up his shot carefully.
bilingual.target: 猎人仔细瞄准了他的射击。

bilingual.source: He hit the target with a single shot.
bilingual.target: 他只用了单发射击就击中了目标。

bilingual.source: He practiced his shot every day at the range.
bilingual.target: 他每天在靶场练习他的射击。

bilingual.source: The hunter aimed and fired a shot at the deer.
bilingual.target: 猎人瞄准并对鹿进行了射击。

bilingual.source: The suspect was immobilized by a taser shot.
bilingual.target: 嫌疑人被电击枪射击后无法动弹。

bilingual.source: He took a shot at the target but missed.
bilingual.target: 他对着目标进行了射击，但没有命中。

bilingual.source: He took a shot at the target and missed.
bilingual.target: 他对着目标进行了射击，但没有命中。

list.abstract: Shot是一个英语单词，有名词、形容词、动词三种词性，作名词时意为“发射；炮弹；射手”，作形容词时意为“用尽的；破旧的；杂色的，闪光的”，作动词时意为“射击”。

yingyinNormal.en: Your sister, she shot 'em in the body, but you have to hit 'em here. That's what kills them. Why?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你妹妹，她冲着它们的身体射击，但你们得射这里，这样才能杀死它们。为什么？

yingyinNormal.en: She is good. I took a shot there.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是很不错。我真没料到。

yingyinNormal.en: President Frank Underwood has been shot.
yingyinNormal.zh: 弗兰克·安德伍德总统遭到了枪击。

yingyinNormal.en: It was your man who got shot last night.
yingyinNormal.zh: 昨晚中枪的是你的人。

yingyinNormal.en: He killed her. One shot through the head.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他杀了她，对着她头部开了一枪。

yingyinNormal.en: What's happened? The president's been shot.
yingyinNormal.zh: 怎么了？总统遇刺了。

yingyinNormal.en: They shot Nick Fury. And it won't end there.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们刺杀了尼克弗瑞，事情没有到此结束。

yingyinNormal.en: They all want to take a shot at the sheriff.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们都想拔得头筹。

yingyinNormal.en: All right, guys. We've got one shot at this.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好了，大伙儿。我们只有一次机会。

yingyinNormal.en: I shot that shit outta the sky. It's nothing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我就朝天射了两下，把那飞机打下来了，那也没什么。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah. Oh, I don't think you have a shot there.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是的哦，我看你没戏。

yingyinNormal.en: That's not what I said. Tall cap triple-shot half caf?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我好像点的不是这个。小杯卡布奇诺 三份脱咖啡因对吧？

yingyinNormal.en: There's a lot of money riding on this, Will. You only get one shot. One shot is all I need.
yingyinNormal.zh: 威尔，这研究可是花了大血本的，你只有一次机会。一次机会足矣。
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《Rise of the Planet of the Apes》

yingyinNormal.en: One. That's a bit of a long shot, isn't it? One system with three potential worlds? No long shot.
yingyinNormal.zh: 就一个，不觉得风险有点大吗？一个星系，要是有三个可能的地方，已经不错了。

yingyinNormal.en: That's when we take our shot. Get a clear shot, wait on my command and give her everything you got.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那时就是我们发动进攻的时候，一枪命中，听我命令，尽全力攻击。

yingyinNormal.en: You really want to be Mr. Big Shot? Here, I'll tell you what, you pay the whole bill, Mr. Big Shot, all right.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你那么想当大人物？这样吧，钱都由你出，大人物，好吗。

yingyinNormal.en: The guy was here. He went for his gun. Bang, we shot him.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那家伙在这儿，他要去拿他的枪，砰的一声，我们打中了他。

yingyinNormal.en: He was shot from a distance of 300 metres with this rifle.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他是在三百米外被这只来福枪射杀的。

yingyinNormal.en: That's three hours of picking out shoes just shot to hell.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我选了三个小时的鞋就这么一扫而空了。

yingyinNormal.en: No, but you gave it your best shot. So, what do you think?
yingyinNormal.zh: 并没有，不过你尽了全力，你觉得怎样?

exam_freq_info.chinese: 开枪; 射击; 投篮
弹丸; 炮弹; 子弹

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 射死；射伤；射中；急速移动；射门；投篮；将…转向；拍摄；发芽；长苗；注射；准确刨平

word_family.mean: v. 为...装子弹；制造弹药；射死；射伤；射中；（shoot的过去式和过去分词）

examination_example.sentence: Derek Jarman's yellow-tinted film Towards Avebury is a collection of long, mostly still <highlight>shots</highlight> of the Wiltshire landscape.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 德里克·贾曼(Derek Jarman)的黄色电影《走向埃夫伯里》(Towards Avebury)是一部关于威尔特郡(Wiltshire)风景的长镜头集，其中大部分是静止镜头。

sense_info_list.zh: 开枪; 射击; 投篮
弹丸; 炮弹; 子弹

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>

v. 射死；射伤；射中；急速移动；射门；投篮；将…转向；拍摄；发芽；长苗；注射；准确刨平

sense_info_list.en: the action of firing a gun or another weapon
sense_info_list.zh: 发射; 射击; 开火

examination_example.sentence: Their parents worry about them getting <highlight>shot</highlight>, beaten up or in trouble with the law.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们的父母担心他们会被枪击、殴打或触犯法律。

examination_example.sentence: While bullying is parents' greatest concern over all, nearly half of low-income parents worry their child will get <highlight>shot</highlight>, compared with one-fifth of high-income parents.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管欺凌是父母最担心的问题，但近一半的低收入父母担心自己的孩子会被枪杀，而高收入父母的这一比例为五分之一。

sense_info_list.zh: 照片; 快照; 镜头; 片段

examination_example.sentence: I think it will make a great <highlight>shot</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我认为它会是一个很好的镜头。

sense_info_list.en: an attempt to do or achieve something that you have not done before

examination_example.sentence: They use new types of guns, and birds could easily be <highlight>shot</highlight> down in flight.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们使用新型枪支，飞行中的鸟很容易被击落。

examination_example.sentence: It is impossible that a single <highlight>shot</highlight> of education, administered in childhood and early adulthood, will be able to support a sustained, 60-year career.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在童年和成年早期所接受的一次性教育不可能支撑60年这么持久的职业生涯。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 射死；射伤；射中；急速移动；射门；投篮；将…转向；拍摄；发芽；长苗；注射；准确刨平

word_family.mean: v. 为...装子弹；制造弹药；射死；射伤；射中；（shoot的过去式和过去分词）

examination_example.sentence: We all spoke the same language of passes and <highlight>shots</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们都使用相同的传球和射门语言。

examination_example.sentence: Through the first two games, her team did not get one serious <highlight>shot</highlight> on goal.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在前两场比赛中，她的球队没有一次真正的射门得分。

sense_info_list.en: the action of firing a gun or another weapon
sense_info_list.zh: 发射; 射击; 开火

examination_example.sentence: Jeff had hunted in Iowa before Thanksgiving with his dog, Rosie, but the gun <highlight>shots</highlight> had scared the dog off.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 感恩节前夕，Jeff和他的狗Rosie在爱荷华州打猎，但是枪声把狗吓跑了。

examination_example.sentence: Staff members hold plenty of bar events for guests like free <highlight>shots</highlight>, bar crawls and karaoke.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 工作人员为客人举办大量的酒吧活动，如免费拍照、串酒吧和卡拉OK。

发射; 射击; 开火

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 射手；枪手；炮手；射击运动员；投篮者；射门者；擦地球；一客酒；手枪；掷骰子者
n. 射；射击；枪杀；狩猎权；狩猎场
v. 射死；射伤；射中；急速移动；射门；投篮；将…转向；拍摄；发芽；长苗；注射；准确刨平

word_family.mean: v. 为...装子弹；制造弹药；射死；射伤；射中；（shoot的过去式和过去分词）

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 大人物；要人；有影响的人
没射中；未进球；错过一次机会

sense_info_list.zh: 击球; 射门; 投篮

examination_example.sentence: During the second half, she made an amazing <highlight>shot</highlight>!
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在下半场，她投了一个精彩的球！

examination_example.sentence: They talked about how Mavis scored in the first half with a power <highlight>shot</highlight> from the halfway line.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们谈到了马维斯在上半场是如何从半场线上用强力射门得分的。

examination_example.sentence: Just like any kid, it upsets him when he misses a <highlight>shot</highlight> or makes a bad pass.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 就像其他孩子一样，当他投篮不中或传球失误时，他会感到沮丧。

sense_info_list.en: the action of firing a gun or another weapon
sense_info_list.zh: 发射; 射击; 开火

examination_example.sentence: When you're embarrassed, your brain releases a <highlight>shot</highlight> of adrenaline（肾上腺素）, which makes your heart race and blood vessels become larger in size.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当你感到尴尬时，你的大脑会释放出一股肾上腺素，这使得你的心跳加速，血脉喷张。

examination_example.sentence: There was a school shooter, <highlight>shots</highlight> were fired, and 4 students were injured thus far.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有一名学校枪手开枪射击，到目前为止有4名学生受伤。

examination_example.sentence: He carefully lined up his <highlight>shot</highlight> (镜头) and waited hopefully till the sun reached the ground.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他小心地摆好镜头，满怀希望地等待着，直到太阳落山。

examination_example.sentence: This <highlight>shot</highlight> life is some reason for their popularity.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这种拍摄生活是他们受欢迎的一些原因。

examination_example.sentence: In fact, there are a lot more than just the big <highlight>shots</highlight> who are successful in life without finishing school.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 事实上，不完成学业就能获得人生成功的大人物多得很。

examination_example.sentence: What does the underlined expression "big <highlight>shots</highlight>" in the third paragraph mean?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 第三段中下划线的“大人物”是什么意思？
